title: Bathroom ideas: create a comfortable space
text: Discover more about the Geberit range » Your home is your retreat. It’s the place where you retire to cosset yourself, where you can leave the outside world behind. It’s a deeply personal space that should feel like a special haven – which is why decisions about the fixtures and fittings are so important. Choosing the right furniture, décor, accessories and appliances is a crucial part of building a comfortable, high-functioning space. And because we have to live with the decisions we make in our homes every single day, it’s worth taking the time – and spending the money – to get it right. And that’s where the Geberit AquaClean Mera shower toilet comes in. It has already won two prestigious awards for its outstanding product design, so you know its elegant aesthetics aren’t in question. There’s even a discreet light for night-time use, to save you from stumbling around in the dark But it’s what’s under the – automatically opening – lid that is just as important. Starting with a self-warming seat for extra comfort, it also boasts a highly efficient TurboFlush cleansing of the pan and air extraction. WhirlSpray shower technology and airflow drying ensure that it gently cleans and dries, giving you the most hygienic toilet experience possible with every visit. Everything about this revolutionary lavatory is geared to adding a little bit of luxury to the everyday. There’s even a discreet light for night-time use, to save you from stumbling around in the dark. It is one of those situations in which the experts have thought of everything so that you don’t have to: the sort of home comfort that is worth the investment. After all, when it comes to your personal well-being, both physical and emotional – it is simply not worth cutting corners. Geberit knows that well-being starts at home It’s easy to make small life changes to improve your health and happiness – and that includes investing in your bathroom. The new Geberit AquaClean Mera shower toilet provides a complete cleaning and hygiene solution. With unique features including a built-in revitalising shower spray, warm-water system, separate lady wash, dryer, odour extraction and automatic lid, it provides a clean and fresh feeling every time. • Visit the Geberit Facebook or Twitter page for more information on AquaClean products
